tool_description: An API showing Philippine Stock Exchange data
name: PSE Data
title: PSE Data

api_list.name: Get PSE Company List
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all PSE listed companies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pse-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/pse/getcompanies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pse-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pse-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/pse/getcompanies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pse-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Company Chart Data
api_list.description: This endpoint will return Chart Data of the specified company for the specified period.

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: If endDate is not specified the default value would be the current date.

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: If startDate is not specified the default would be endDate/currentDate - 1 year

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pse-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/pse/getchartdata/29/146/01-01-2000/11-04-2021"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pse-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pse-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/pse/getchartdata/{cmpy_id}/{security_id}/{startdate}/{enddate}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pse-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
